name: Garry the Bot
description: Garry the Bot is on a mission to save his creator and friend- the professor. He has to go through several obstacles, solve puzzles such as moving boxes in specific places and avoid getting hit by spikes and water! In order to proceed through the level, Garry has to place the specific- colored box in the specific- colored slot in order to open a portal that will help him proceed further. There are also several jump pads that can help Garry reach places he wouldn't normally be able to. Please note: this is only one level game and it is not fully polished, as it was for a university project!
